articles.content: For those who follow the space, LG will be remembered fondly as a smartphone trailblazer. For a decade-and-a-half, the company was a major player in the Android category and a driving force behind a … [+1520 chars]

articles.author: Simone Grogan
articles.title: Titomic (ASX:TTT) lines up joint venture with U.K. engineering firm - The Market Herald
articles.description: Titomic (TTT) has reached an agreement with an international engineering group to manufacture and supply its multi-metal product solutions in the U.K.
articles.content:
